        public void turnFace(int dir_x)
        make unit turn around if it changes direction
        参数:
        dir_x - the x direction of movement in this frame

      • attack

        public void attack(Unit target,
                   int delta)
        to let this object attack another
        参数:
        target - the object which is attacked
        delta - the number of millisecond per frame
